abstract: Kroton Educacional has agreed to sell its learning unit Uniasselvi to the Carlyle Group and the Brazilian investment firm Vinci Partners for $284.6 million.
snippet: Kroton Educacional has agreed to sell its learning unit Uniasselvi to the Carlyle Group and the Brazilian investment firm Vinci Partners for $284.6 million.
lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO — Kroton Educacional S.A. has agreed to sell its learning unit Uniasselvi, to the Carlyle Group and the Brazilian investment firm Vinci Partners for 1.105 billion Brazilian reais, or $284.6 million, it said in a filing with the country’s securities regulator on Monday.

headline.main: Carlyle Group and Vinci Partners Buy Brazilian Education Business
